A6020.changelog:
- Blacklisted google hotword service to fix mic issues
- Enabled audiosphere effect by default
- Fixed FM radio
- Fixed postprocessing daemon crashes
- Misc changes for infra

X00T.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH REQUIRED (If you are coming from build with 4.4 kernel, i.e: before 09.04.2021 build) 

- Initial stable build with 4.19 kernel
- Added debloated ZenParts
- Fixed incorrect battery temperature, enjoy stock rom like charging.
- Updated most Hals and blobs from R tags (kona / 89xx)

- Fixed eis
- Fixed Zenmotions
- Fixed USB tethering

beryllium.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!

cas.changelog:
1. Expand system partition size from 1GB to 4GB, to better support GSI and GAPPS flashing
2. Now we use redfin fingerprint to pass the Play Protect certification

cmi.changelog:
! ! ! Firmware and vendor require update to V12.2.4.0.RJACNXM.

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

davinci.changelog:
01/04/2021
- Reduced battery drain
16/03/2021
- Fixed System UI crash after opening the in-app fingerprint dialog
- Various other minor bug fixes and improvements
25/02/2021
-Fixed missing signal until a few minutes pass after boot
15/02/2021
-Fixed FOD after WFD (the screen will bright up for recognizing the fingerprint after using WFD, but works. A reboot will restore the normal behaviour as usual)
-Switched to perf kernel
-Updated blobs to MIUI 21.2.3

Notes:
- Recommended firmware is MIUI 20.10.20 or higher (China Beta)
- Minimum firmware is MIUI V12.0.5.0
- Recommended recovery is the OFFICIAL TWRP

gauguin.changelog:
- Adjust audio steps
- Wifi overlays update
- Fixed bluetooth audio issues
- Fixed fp sensor touch events
- More misc changes/fixes

ginkgo.changelog:
- Updated stock blobs from MIUI 21.3.3
- Updated CAF blobs from LA.UM.9.11.r1-02800-NICOBAR.0
- Updated redfin fp to march (fixed safetynet)
- Fixed camera freeze in some social media apps
- Fixed camera lens switching delay
- Fixed voip/mic issues in some apps
- KCAL improvements in xiaomi parts
- Added vibration strength control in xiaomi parts
- Made notch cutout wider/smoother
- Switched to new QTI thermal HAL
- Attempted to fix screen blackouts under sunlight/heat
- Disabled KPTI for performance improvement
- Reduced readahead to 128kB to improve storage performance
- GPS config optimizations and fixes
- Tuned cpusets for better performance
- Improved rounded corners and fixed hide cutout option
- Switched to android userspace LMKD
- Added support for willow hwversion 18.31.0
- Improved zram read/write performance
- Switched to QuicksilveR v2.5 kernel
- Merged LA.UM.9.1.r1-09100-SMxxx0.0 CAF and v4.14.223 in kernel
- Fast charging on chinese ginkgo variants maybe fixed
- Misc optimizations and fixes

lavender.changelog:
- CLEAN FLASH PLEASE
- Enable SmartCharging
- Moved XiaomiParts to System/XiaomiParts
- Audio improvements
- Use GCamGoPrebuilt instead of Snap/Camera2
- Fix Deepsleep while Bluetooth is turned on
- Enable QPower and Deep sleep at the same time
- Cleanup Wifi and Tether rro_overlays
- Cleanup Wifi packages
- Address Camera, Radio, and moar Denials
- GPS Cleanup
- Enable VR Hal
- Update Build FP for March SPL
- Enable Advance Logcat Debugging
- Fix ctl.interface_start error spams
- Enable New Google Keyboard Theme
- Force set QS Rows to 2
- SELinux Enforcing

lmi.changelog:
- Firmware and vendor require V12.2.1.0.RJKCNXM.

- Device: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_device_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0
- Blobs: https://github.com/ArrowOS-Devices/android_vendor_xiaomi_lmi/commits/arrow-11.0

miatoll.changelog:
• Upstreamed kernel to 4.14.231
• Tuned vibration pattern
• Enabled full vndk support
• Sepolicy improvements (credits @Ramisky)
• Fixed sim carrier network delay after reboot
• Addressed the remaining selinux denials

mido.changelog:
Note:
- These are still going to continue on 3.18 builds only.
- Requests for 4.9 builds will be ignored.

This decision has been taken as per the equal no.of requests from both sides of the parties and concluded by the outcome of adverse performance affects.

monet.changelog:
- Kernel: Merged CAF tag LA.UM.9.12.r1-11000-SMxx50.0
- Cleanup props
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

perseus.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- It is required firmware part MIUI Q CN (Example V12.0.3.0.QEECNXM).

phoenix.changelog:
- Kernel upstreamed to 4.14.214
- light: Properly scale brightness range
- light: Avoid uint32_t underflow
- decrease in-call volume a bit

polaris.changelog:
- Enable ZRAM (3Gb, lz4 compress algorithm)
- Enable H/W Composition
- Enable UBWC aligned framebuffer
- Enable Codec2 support
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Update 2021-01-01 and earlier builds only with clean flash!
- From now on it is required to be on Q firmware (11.0.3.0 global or more new)

raphael.changelog: This build comes with OSS Vendor and requires only the MIUI Q firmware.

sanders.changelog:
Clean flash must (kindly backup your data before flashing)
improved  performance
Enabled ZRAM by default
Tuned ZRAM for better performance
Compiled with hwui for better performance
Switched to Mad Kernel 2.0

surya.changelog:
- Misc fixes and upstream changes.

Note:
- Unified builds

sweet.changelog:
Latest:
- Switched to open source kernel
- Upstreamed the kernel to Linux 4.14.190
- Added KCAL color adjustment
- Increased brightness range (minimum brightness can be lower now)
- Increased haptic feedback strength
- Hidden settings which were not compatible with the device

16/04/2021:
- Removed the "SIM is HD capable" notification
- Improved automatic brightness
- Enabled color profiles
- Fixed fingerprint in apps
- Enabled burn-in protection
- Fixed AOD counting as SOT
- DT2W on AOD fixed

14/04/2021:
- Initial official release

- For installation information, refer to https://telegra.ph/Installation-of-ArrowOS-04-13

taimen.changelog:
Boost GPU on EXPENSIVE_RENDERING power hint
Bump expensive rendering GPU boost frequency to 515 MHz
Update Kernel to 4.4.267

umi.changelog:
Firmware and vendor require lastest MIUI Stable V12.2.10

- Show FOD Animation settings
- Update WifiOverlay and TetheringOverlay
- wifi: Enable QPower and Deep sleep together
- Remove extra GBoard spacing
- Update CarrierConfig overlays
- More comfortable rounded corners

violet.changelog: test PWM flicker, auto-brightness, and manual brightness too

whyred.changelog:
• Upstream kernel to v4.4.266
